price: 21. Gehoorzaam degenen die geen betaling van jullie vragen, en die rechtgeleid zijn.
arabic: ٱتَّبِعُواْ مَن لَّا يَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ أَجۡرٗا وَهُم مُّهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: ittabiʿū man lā yasalukum ajran wahum muh'tadūna
